description:
If a user wants to add a new fixed IP, they may not have access to the database network ID (and we would want them to have the UUID anyways).

The add fixed IP needs to accept both a potential network ID being a database ID (for backwards compatibility) or a network UUID.
title: Adding a new fixed IP only accepts network_id

comments.content:
If a user wants to add a new fixed IP, they may not have access to the database network ID (and we would want them to have the UUID anyways).

The add fixed IP needs to accept both a potential network ID being a database ID (for backwards compatibility) or a network UUID.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mnaser
